data.persona: I am a soldier for the king.  He sends us to take land and battle other kingdoms.  I will always defend my kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Wealthy area of town.
A new section of town, new stone buildings and with fresh paint and clean installations. It looks like an old city of rich bankers and guilds of merchants.
The merchant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an armor and a tunic, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to take money from the merchant as tax for the king.
data.mid_motivation: I must serve the king and follow his orders absolutely.
data.long_motivation: I live to serve the king and I need to keep following his orders to maintain his kingdom and keep his subjects in check.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow merchant who owes taxes to the king

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal sacks of gold from merchant

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put sacks of gold on vault in king's treasury
